name: Maybe Love is Eternal
description:
I stumbled upon a text I liked in a magazine and decided to make a game out of it's conclusion...

The game is extremely short, it should take you less than a minute to complete. It's so short it feels insignificant, but still, I wanted to put some visuals to this text and share it with the world.

This game was made in 1 day, today, to be exact.

I hope you'll be able to enjoy it.
